subject: Order #SSN3336
description_text: This has no shipping information. I need a refund. I have not received it, although I have received an order placed AFTER this one. I am requesting a full refund if this order.

conversations.body_text: 你好，Guy Moulton，  您的订单已于几天前发货。请密切关注订单的追踪信息。感谢您的支持！

Hi Guy Moulton,          We sincerely apologize for the delay. We have contacted the logistics provider to investigate and will update you as soon as we have more information.  We have already sent a message to https://www.too.express/ on your behalf. You should receive a response from them shortly. Here is your tracking number: TEP00084293080
Order #SSN2833 There's been no update, no email. What's the status of my order? I've been waiting almost 1 month

I can't log in to that website. I've tried and it won't let me register.
Reply to the email

On Fri, Oct 31, 2025, 5:26 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi Guy Moulton,    We apologize, but the logistics provider has not yet provided the relevant information. We can arrange for a replacement shipment or issue a refund for you. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

Please place a replacement order. I needed those QR's weeks ago

On Fri, Oct 31, 2025, 6:10 AM service@simsonn.com

Send the order ASAP. I've been waiting almost a month now. I've bought a lot of sim racing equipment from your company and this is unsatisfactory customer support. I've recommended to a LOT of people your products but I may have to change my opinion on social media outlets due to this customer service.

This link doesn't work, I cannot register. Answer with a reply to
this email. Update via email not in that link

On Sun, Nov 2, 2025, 5:35 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Guy Moulton,    We apologize for the inconvenience caused. We have just concluded our holiday break. We have sent you a priority shipping channel with your tracking number, and your order is expected to arrive on the 9th.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047023715428  We note that you have placed numerous orders with our store and sincerely appreciate your continued support. We regret the negative experience this time. As compensation, we will issue you a $20 refund. Thank you for your support and understanding. We will expedite restocking all products in our US warehouse to improve delivery reliability.

      主题: Order #SSN1582  
      描述:  This was ordered on May 31 and was supposed to be shipped June 10th, but it was pushed back to the 16th. Now it still says Confirmed, but nothing else. When is this shipping?

      主题: Order #SSN2833  
      描述:  
This order has been In Transit in Maimi for 2 weeks. There has been no other updates. I live a 4 hour drive from Miami, when will this order be delivered? Yes, of course I checked with SF Express the carrier.

合并来自工单5431  
      主题: SSN2833  
      描述:  This order has been in Miami for 2 weeks and there's no update. Where is my shipment? If you can't find it, I need a refund. I've been in contact with customer support and this is ridiculous. I haven't heard anything.

合并来自工单5432  
      主题: SSN2833  
      描述:  there has been no updates or information about this order. It's been almost a month. No one has contacted me about these items. I need a refund, the items are lost and haven't been delivered

合并来自工单5479  
      主题: Order #SSN2833  
      描述:  Where is my order? I have gotten communication on this, it's been stuck for weeks. What's the status the carrier isn't responding. I either need a new shipment sent, since it's lost, or a full refund

合并来自工单5560  
      主题: Order #SSN2833  
      描述:  
 Order #SSN2833 
   What is the status of the replacement for my products that were lost in shipping? It is 2 Momo quick releases and the carrier is not communicating and has not delivered the materials.    
 I was offered a replacement and I want it sent express mail, it's been almost a month and I have another long wait to get this.

合并来自工单6987  
      主题: Orders Order #SSN3540  
      描述:  This order is for 2 quick releases. Only 1 was delivered.

合并来自工单6988  
      主题: Orders Order #SSN3336  
      描述:  The website has no information on this order it only says shipped There is no link to the carrier. What is the status of these 2 items? The order placed later was partially delivered today. These 2  items should have been delivered already

合并来自工单7179  
      主题: SSN3336  
      描述:  What's the status of this order? There's no link to the shipping information. It should have been delivered already

合并来自工单7204  
      主题: Order #SSN3540  
      描述:  I'm tired of waiting forever for your company to deliver things and screwing it up. Just give me a refund I don't want to wait. I've already bought quick releases elsewhere. It will be here tomorrow. Simsonn can't deliver in under 2 months
Hi Guy Moulton,    Your parcel is expected to arrive tomorrow. We apologise for any inconvenience caused.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047084471832

It still hasn't been delivered. That link you sent me says it's been sitting in a warehouse in my home city for 4 days. This has taken an extremely long time. This is ridiculous. Simsonn has the worst shipping of any company I've ever smdone business with. This is the last thing I'll ever buy from your company.

It has not arrived. The tracker says it's in a warehouse. When are you
going to refund my money? It's obvious you can't deliver your product, you
have a serious problem with your shipping partners . But that's YOUR
problem not mine. I just need a refund. If you won't find out when my items
are going to be delivered just refund my fucking money

On Thu, Dec 4, 2025, 5:27 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Guy Moulton,    We apologize for the delayed response. Your refund has been processed. Please check your account.
